Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Views

Class GameBoardView

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Views.GameBoardView
public class GameBoardView extends Object
The view class for gameBoard that displays data in the user interface.

    • obtainPathValues

      public String[] obtainPathValues(String path)
      A method responsible to remove unwanted letters in the string and split the string into two values.
      Parameters:
      path - the path that contains all 35 lines of crack elements.
      Returns:
      an array of string which contains the correct data format.
